metadata.title: CVE-2016-5273 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The mozilla::a11y::HyperTextAccessible::GetChildOffset function in theaccessibility implementation in Mozilla Firefox before 49.0 allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted web site.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5273` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 49.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 49.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 49.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 49.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '49.0+build4-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
